channel.title: InnovationX Source Help!
channel.description:
Well I Am Using InnovationX's Source and I need Help :/
The Run Code: @echo off @title InnovationX :run java -Xms1024m -Xmx1024m -server Server goto run
The Error: Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java: 202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Metho at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.j ava:19 at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:3 06) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launche r.java at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:2 47) Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit.
Please Help Thanks

item.title: InnovationX Source Help!
item.dc:creator: @SexMoneyModz SexMoneyModz
item.description:
@SexMoneyModz wrote:

Well I Am Using InnovationX’s Source and I need Help

The Run Code: @echo off
@title InnovationX
:run
java -Xms1024m -Xmx1024m -server Server
goto run

The Error: Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java: 202)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Metho
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.j ava:19
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:3 06)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launche r.java
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:2 47)
Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit.

Please Help Thanks

Read full topic
